snippet: Mr. Rees, a lanky, Welsh-born actor and director, was known for roles on “Cheers” and “The West Wing,” but made his biggest mark as Nicholas Nickleby in the early 1980s.
abstract: Roger Rees, Welsh-born actor who earned fame playing title character in stage adaptation of The Life and Adventures of Nicholas Nickleby and who was known for playing eccentric characters, dies at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rees, a lanky, Welsh-born actor and director, was known for roles on “Cheers” and “The West Wing,” but made his biggest mark as Nicholas Nickleby in the early 1980s.

headline.main: Roger Rees, Actor Who Won Tony as Nicholas Nickleby, Dies at 71
headline.print_headline: Roger Rees, Actor Who Won Tony as Nickleby, Dies at 71
